casebody.data:
BATTLE RIDGE COMPANIES
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION. No. 643P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Joseph E. Herin, Assistant Attorney General, for NC Dept. of Transportation. Harry Bivens, Charlotte, for Battle Ridge Company.

Prior report: 161 N.CApp. 156, 587 S.E.2d 426.

ORDER Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 19th day of February 2004 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Swain County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th day of February 2004."
